workflow.name: Generate weekly marketing performance reports with GPT-4o & Google Docs to Slack
workflow.description:
## Description
Save hours of manual reporting with this **end-to-end automation**.  
This workflow pulls campaign performance data (demo or live), generates a **clear AI-powered executive summary**, and compiles everything into a polished weekly report. The report is formatted in Markdown, automatically stored in **Google Docs**, and instantly shared with your team via **Slack** ‚Äî no spreadsheets, no copy-paste, no delays.  

### What it does
- ‚è∞ Runs on a schedule (e.g. every Monday morning)  
- üìä Collects performance metrics (Google Ads, Meta, TikTok, YouTube ‚Äì demo data included)  
- ü§ñ Uses AI to summarize wins, issues, and recommendations  
- üìù Builds a structured Markdown report (totals, channel performance, top campaigns)  
- üìÑ Creates and updates a **Google Doc** with the report  
- üí¨ Notifies your team in Slack with topline numbers + direct report link  
- üìß Optionally email the report to stakeholders or clients  

### Why it‚Äôs valuable
- **Saves time** ‚Äì no manual data aggregation  
- **Standardizes reporting** ‚Äì same format and quality every week  
- **Adds insights** ‚Äì AI highlights what matters most  
- **Improves transparency** ‚Äì instant access via Docs, Slack, or Email  
- **Scales easily** ‚Äì adapt to multiple clients or campaigns  
- **Professional delivery** ‚Äì branded, polished reports on autopilot  

üí° Extra recommendation: Connect to a **Google Docs template** to give your reports a professional, branded look.

parameters.content:
## üìä What the Automation Does
- Runs automatically on a schedule (e.g. every Monday).  
- Pulls campaign performance data (here: demo data for Google Ads, Meta, TikTok, YouTube).  
- Uses AI (LLM) to write a clear executive summary with wins, issues, and recommendations.  
- Builds a structured report in Markdown (totals, channel performance, top campaigns).  
- Creates a Google Doc with the full report.  
- Notifies the team in Slack with topline numbers + report link.  
- Emails the report directly to stakeholders or clients.

values.content: You are a senior performance marketer. Write concise, actionable summaries.

parameters.content:
## üí° Why This Is Valuable
- Saves time ‚Äì no manual copy-paste across ad platforms or spreadsheets.  
- Standardizes reporting ‚Äì same structure and clarity every week.  
- Adds insights ‚Äì AI summary highlights wins, problems, and recommendations automatically.  
- Improves transparency ‚Äì team + client get instant access in Slack/Docs/Email.  
- Scales easily ‚Äì works for multiple clients/campaigns with minimal changes.  
- Professional client experience ‚Äì polished reports delivered consistently on time.

## üìä Generate Metrics (Demo)
Produces fake ad performance data for Google Ads, Meta, TikTok & YouTube.

üëâ Replace with real API connectors (Google Ads, Meta Ads, TikTok, YouTube) if you want live data.

## ü§ñ AI Executive Summary
Sends metrics to OpenAI (LLM) to create a concise summary with wins, issues, and recommendations.  

üëâ Make sure your **OpenAI credentials** are connected.

## üìù Build Markdown Report
Combines raw metrics + AI summary into a structured Markdown report.  
Includes totals, per-channel table, and top campaigns by ROAS. 
 
üëâ Node name references must match exactly (‚ÄúGoogle Ads Demo‚Äù, ‚ÄúMessage a model‚Äù).

## üìÑ Google Docs Creation
Creates a new Google Doc titled  
**‚ÄúWeekly Performance Report ‚Äì [Start Date] to [End Date]‚Äù**.  

üëâ Requires Google Docs OAuth connection.

## üñäÔ∏è Update Google Doc
Inserts the Markdown report into the created document.  
üëâ You‚Äôll get a polished report ready for sharing.

## üí¨ Slack Notification
Sends a Slack message with topline numbers (ROAS, Spend) + direct link to the Google Doc.  
üëâ Connect your Slack account and set the channel ID.

## üí° Extra Recommendation: Use a Google Docs Template
Instead of creating a blank Google Doc, connect this workflow to a **pre-styled Google Docs template**.  
üëâ This makes your reports look more professional right away.  

### Benefits:
- Consistent branding (logo, fonts, colors).  
- Polished design without extra formatting steps.  
- Easier for clients/stakeholders to read.  

### How:
1. Create a Google Docs file with your preferred layout and styles.  
2. Save its **document ID**.  
3. Replace the "Create Google Doc" node with a **Copy Document** step that duplicates your template.  
4. Update the copy with the AI-generated report content.  

üí° Result: Every report keeps a consistent, branded look while still being updated automatically.

user.name: Emilio Loewenstein
user.bio: Emilio is an AI Engineer and Co-Founder of an AI agency, building intelligent systems that help businesses automate, innovate, and scale.
